title: Video Game NFS4 1999 - \*.ffn File?
tags: Need Speed High Stakes 4 Game Racing Galext18 ffn
content:
Hi,  
i am searching for a font which is used in EA's 1999 Need For Speed High Stakes (NFS4 EA Canada). Thought of using it for some Artwork.  
Its mostly used in headlines, although it seems to have only lowercase letters.  
The font is stored in a file called "Galext18.ffn" ... maybe thats helpful (btw renaming to \*.ttf does not work).  
In the attached image I cut together different samples from menu and loading screens.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824183433im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Unknown_6037.png)

I couldnt find any information so far and "What the Font" did not show any helpful results. Are there other image based search engines?

It would be awesome to have at least a similar font.

Thx4Reading  
Greetings
author: Mr.47

comments.content: [VGC Inverserif aka Opti Iambic aka FBK Speedway aka Brendel Informatik Concorde aka Bambootypes Magenta](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824183433/http:/typophile.com/node/102242)
